005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDecimalItem;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.INumericItem;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.InvalidTypeMetapathException;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.TypeMetapathException;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
016
017import java.math.BigInteger;
018import java.math.MathContext;
019import java.util.Collection;
020import java.util.HashMap;
021import java.util.List;
022import java.util.Map;
023import java.util.Set;
024import java.util.stream.Collectors;
025import java.util.stream.Stream;
026
027import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
028import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
029
030/**
031 * A collection of utility functions for use in implementing Metapath functions.
032 */
033@SuppressWarnings("PMD.CouplingBetweenObjects")
034public final class FunctionUtils {
035  public static final MathContext MATH_CONTEXT = MathContext.DECIMAL64;
036
037  private FunctionUtils() {
038    // disable
039  }
040
041  /**
042   * Converts a {@link INumericItem} value to an integer value.
043   *
044   * @param value
045   *          the value to convert
046   * @return the integer value
047   * @throws ArithmeticException
048   *           if the provided value will not exactly fit in an {@code int}
049   */
050  public static int asInteger(@NonNull INumericItem value) {
051    return asInteger(value.asInteger());
052  }
053
054  /**
055   * Converts a {@link BigInteger} value to an integer value.
056   *
057   * @param value
058   *          the value to convert
059   * @return the integer value
060   * @throws ArithmeticException
061   *           if the provided value will not exactly fit in an {@code int}
062   */
063  public static int asInteger(@NonNull BigInteger value) {
064    return value.intValueExact();
065  }
066
067  /**
068   * Converts a {@link INumericItem} value to a long value.
069   *
070   * @param value
071   *          the value to convert
072   * @return the long value
073   * @throws ArithmeticException
074   *           if the provided value will not exactly fit in an {@code long}
075   */
076  public static long asLong(@NonNull INumericItem value) {
077    return asLong(value.asInteger());
078  }
079
080  /**
081   * Converts a {@link BigInteger} value to a long value.
082   *
083   * @param value
084   *          the value to convert
085   * @return the long value
086   * @throws ArithmeticException
087   *           if the provided value will not exactly fit in an {@code long}
088   */
089  public static long asLong(@NonNull BigInteger value) {
090    return value.longValueExact();
091  }
092
093  /**
094   * Gets the first item of the provided sequence as a {@link INumericItem} value.
095   * If the sequence is empty, then a {@code null} value is returned.
096   *
097   * @param sequence
098   *          a Metapath sequence containing the value to convert
099   * @param requireSingleton
100   *          if {@code true} then a {@link TypeMetapathException} is thrown if
101   *          the sequence contains more than one item
102   * @return the numeric item value, or {@code null} if the result is an empty
103   *         sequence
104   * @throws TypeMetapathException
105   *           if the sequence contains more than one item, or the item cannot be
106   *           cast to a numeric value
107   *
108   */
109  @Nullable
110  public static INumericItem toNumeric(@NonNull ISequence<?> sequence, boolean requireSingleton) {
111    IItem item = sequence.getFirstItem(requireSingleton);
112    return item == null ? null : toNumeric(item);
113  }
114
115  /**
116   * Gets the provided item value as a {@link INumericItem} value.
117   *
118   * @param item
119   *          the value to convert
120   * @return the numeric item value
121   * @throws TypeMetapathException
122   *           if the sequence contains more than one item, or the item cannot be
123   *           cast to a numeric value
124   */
125  @NonNull
126  public static INumericItem toNumeric(@NonNull IItem item) {
127    // atomize
128    IAnyAtomicItem atomicItem = ISequence.getFirstItem(item.atomize(), true);
129    if (atomicItem == null) {
130      throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(item, "Unable to cast null item");
131    }
132    return toNumeric(atomicItem);
133  }
134
135  /**
136   * Gets the provided item value as a {@link INumericItem} value.
137   *
138   * @param item
139   *          the value to convert
140   * @return the numeric item value
141   * @throws TypeMetapathException
142   *           if the item cannot be cast to a numeric value
143   */
144  @NonNull
145  public static INumericItem toNumeric(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item) {
146    try {
147      return IDecimalItem.cast(item);
148    } catch (InvalidValueForCastFunctionException ex) {
149      throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(item, ex.getLocalizedMessage(), ex);
150    }
151  }
152
153  /**
154   * Gets the provided item value as a {@link INumericItem} value. If the item is
155   * {@code null}, then a {@code null} value is returned.
156   *
157   * @param item
158   *          the value to convert
159   * @return the numeric item value
160   * @throws TypeMetapathException
161   *           if the item cannot be cast to a numeric value
162   */
163  @Nullable
164  public static INumericItem toNumericOrNull(@Nullable IAnyAtomicItem item) {
165    return item == null ? null : toNumeric(item);
166  }
167
168  /**
169   * Casts the provided {@code item} as the result type, if the item is not
170   * {@code null}.
171   *
172   * @param <TYPE>
173   *          the Java type to cast to
174   * @param item
175   *          the value to cast
176   * @return the item cast to the required type or {@code null} if the item is
177   *         {@code null}
178   * @throws ClassCastException
179   *           if the item's type is not compatible with the requested type
180   */
181  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
182  @Nullable
183  public static <TYPE extends IItem> TYPE asTypeOrNull(@Nullable IItem item) {
184    return (TYPE) item;
185  }
186
187  /**
188   * Casts the provided {@code item} as the result type.
189   *
190   * @param <TYPE>
191   *          the Java type to cast to
192   * @param item
193   *          the value to cast
194   * @return the item cast to the required type
195   * @throws ClassCastException
196   *           if the item's type is not compatible with the requested type
197   */
198  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
199  @NonNull
200  public static <TYPE extends IItem> TYPE asType(@NonNull IItem item) {
201    return (TYPE) item;
202  }
203
204  /**
205   * Casts the provided {@code item} as the result sequence type.
206   *
207   * @param <TYPE>
208   *          the Java type to cast to
209   * @param sequence
210   *          the values to cast
211   * @return the sequence cast to the required type
212   * @throws ClassCastException
213   *           if the sequence's type is not compatible with the requested type
214   */
215  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
216  @NonNull
217  public static <TYPE extends IItem> ISequence<TYPE> asType(@NonNull ISequence<?> sequence) {
218    return (ISequence<TYPE>) sequence;
219  }
220
221  /**
222   * Casts the provided {@code item} as the result type.
223   *
224   * @param <TYPE>
225   *          the Java type to cast to
226   * @param clazz
227   *          the Java class instance for the requested type
228   * @param item
229   *          the value to cast
230   * @return the item cast to the required type
231   * @throws InvalidTypeMetapathException
232   *           if the provided item is {@code null} or if the item's type is not
233   *           assignment compatible to the requested type
234   */
235  @NonNull
236  public static <TYPE extends IItem> TYPE requireType(Class<TYPE> clazz, IItem item) {
237    if (item == null) {
238      throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(
239          null,
240          String.format("Expected non-null type '%s', but the node was null.",
241              clazz.getName()));
242    }
243    if (!clazz.isInstance(item)) {
244      throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(
245          item,
246          String.format("Expected type '%s', but the node was type '%s'.",
247              clazz.getName(),
248              item.getClass().getName()));
249    }
250    return asType(item);
251  }
252
253  /**
254   * Casts the provided {@code item} as the result type, if the item is not
255   * {@code null}.
256   *
257   * @param <TYPE>
258   *          the Java type to cast to
259   * @param clazz
260   *          the Java class instance for the requested type
261   * @param item
262   *          the value to cast
263   * @return the item cast to the required type or {@code null} if the item is
264   *         {@code null}
265   * @throws InvalidTypeMetapathException
266   *           if the provided item is {@code null} or if the item's type is not
267   *           assignment compatible to the requested type
268   */
269  @Nullable
270  public static <TYPE extends IItem> TYPE requireTypeOrNull(Class<TYPE> clazz, @Nullable IItem item) {
271    if (item == null || clazz.isInstance(item)) {
272      return asTypeOrNull(item);
273    }
274    throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(
275        item,
276        String.format("Expected type '%s', but the node was type '%s'.",
277            clazz.getName(),
278            item.getClass().getName()));
279  }
280
281  /**
282   * Get a stream of item data types for the stream of items.
283   *
284   * @param items
285   *          the Metapath items to get the data types for
286   * @return a stream of data type classes
287   */
288  @NonNull
289  public static Stream<Class<?>> getTypes(@NonNull Stream<? extends IItem> items) {
290    return ObjectUtils.notNull(items.map(Object::getClass));
291  }
292
293  /**
294   * Generate a list of Metapath item Java type classes from a list of Metapath
295   * items.
296   *
297   * @param <T>
298   *          the base Java types of the items
299   * @param items
300   *          the items to get Java type class for
301   * @return a list of corresponding Java type classes for the provided items
302   */
303  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
304  @NonNull
305  public static <T extends IItem> List<Class<? extends T>> getTypes(@NonNull List<T> items) {
306    return ObjectUtils.notNull(items.stream()
307        .map(item -> (Class<? extends T>) item.getClass())
308        .collect(Collectors.toList()));
309  }
310
311  /**
312   * Count the occurrences of the provided data type item {@code classes} used in
313   * the set of provided {@code items}.
314   *
315   * @param <T>
316   *          the class type
317   * @param classes
318   *          the Metapath item classes to count
319   * @param items
320   *          the Metapath items to analyze
321   * @return a mapping of Metapath item class to count
322   */
323  @NonNull
324  public static <T extends IItem> Map<Class<? extends T>, Integer> countTypes(
325      @NonNull Set<Class<? extends T>> classes,
326      @NonNull Collection<? extends T> items) {
327    Map<Class<? extends T>, Integer> retval = new HashMap<>(); // NOPMD
328    for (T item : items) {
329      Class<?> itemClass = item.getClass();
330      for (Class<? extends T> clazz : classes) {
331        if (clazz.isAssignableFrom(itemClass)) {
332          retval.compute(clazz, (cl, current) -> current == null ? 1 : current + 1);
333        }
334      }
335    }
336    return retval;
337  }
338}
